alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Strafford; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 14 at 10:03AM EST until December 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FIRST SIGNIFICANT WINTER STORM LIKELY THURSDAY NIGHT INTO SATURDAY... .Low pressure will redevelop along the Mid Atlantic Coast Thursday night and then move northeast off the New England coast Friday into Saturday. ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations exceeding 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow could mix or change to rain closer to the coast.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
